value.title: Embed Power BI reports in PowerPoint - Power BI Tips & Tricks #13:
value.excerpt: Learn how to embed or insert power BI reports in PowerPoint!   Looking for a download file? Go to our Download Center: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1  Our PLAYLISTS: - Join

value.title: Extract in Power Query (LEN, LEFT, RIGHT in excel) - #6 (M)agic (M)ondays
value.excerpt: In today's video we will go through the equivalents of LEN, LEFT; RIGHT in Power Query. You can create very complex transformations using the interface in Power Query.  Keynotes: 02:46 -Text Before delimiter 03:37 - Count lenth of text 04:03 - Extract First character 04:11 - Extract Last Character 04:16

value.title: Fill up/ down with conditions in Power Query
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you how to fill up or down based on conditions. I am going to show you two ways to do it, you pick the one need :)  Chapters 00:00 Intro 01:00 First solution using M language 02:50 Second solution using the UI Done!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Get Power BI data in Excel without Pivot Tables | Excel Data Types
value.excerpt: Depending on the Power Bi license and the version of excel you have, you can connect Power BI and Excel using the Get Data - Power BI Datasets, but there is another way that will allow you to grab the data without setting a Pivot Table.   Let me show you how in today's video!  Here you can download all

value.title: How to do Pagination without knowing the number of pages (Part 2) in Power Query | List.Generate

value.title: Incremental refresh for free in Power BI

value.title: Insert text anywhere in a cell without adding a new column using the Power Query User Interface.
value.excerpt: There are no Insert functions ( that I know about) in the power query user interface, so if you dont know M, you probably have to create a new column to insert text in power query.  In today's video, I will show you how you can use power query user interface, to insert text into a column without adding

value.title: Making (some) things transparent in Power BI
value.excerpt: Did you know that you can set transparency as a "color" in Power BI ? In this video I will show you how to do it together with an example of why it is useful.  Enjoy"  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1

value.title: Managing changing column names in Power Query #10: (M)agic (M)ondays
value.excerpt: In today's video, I will show how to manage column headers that changes names so your power bi file does not break when you refresh it.  This tip is from Lars Schreiber and here is the link to his blog post and how to do this in power query: http://power-bi-usergroup.blogspot.se/2015/12/dealing-with-tables-with-changing.html

value.title: Map locations using Power BI shape maps (Part 1)

We will get total population and population growth and map it in Power BI.  Here are the

value.title: Power BI vs Excel: When you should use each tool
value.excerpt: Which tool is best? Power BI or Excel?  Well, it depends on what you are trying to do. Both tools have unique strengths and limitations and in this video I will try to show both.  Hopefully after watching this video, you will have a better understanding of both tools and will know when to use which depending

value.title: Refresh Power BI every second or minute!
value.excerpt: In today's video I am going to show you how to refresh Power BI every minute or any interval you yet :). As with everything, there are some limitations but it doesnt require a premium license.  #curbal #powerbi  Link to the blog post: https://bigintsolutions.com/2019/03/29/refresh-power-bi-report-every-min-and-show-on-a-tv/

After the stopword is sent to sql, a flow will be started to approve the new word. The data will then be imported in Power BI where the

value.title: DAX for Power BI - Calculate Cumulative Sum (Running Total) of Count in Power BI
value.excerpt: The cumulative total is also known as Running total and during this video, we will talk about how we can calculate a cumulative sum for request count using Power BI Dax measure in Power BI.  During this session, we will cover the following things: • Real-life example where we need Cumulative Sum 00:21

value.title: Display selected value from slicer to Power BI Report
value.excerpt: Sometimes, there is a situation where we need to display the selected slicer value in the title of our Power BI visualization. Meaning, we need to set the Dynamic value for our Title column based on the slicer selection. How can we achieve this? How can we set dynamic title value for our Power BI visualization?

value.title: Forecasting in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn how we can forecast our data in Power BI. We will be discussing which visualization supports forecasting in Power BI. We can perform forecasting with a Line chart in Power BI.  In this video, we have taken an example of a real-life scenario to forecast our data.  Stay Connected

value.title: 4 Troubleshooting connectivity tips with the gateway
value.excerpt: This video was based on a call I had last week relating to troubleshooting connectivity to a SQL Server named instance from the Power BI gateway. This is really my thought process for how I handle connection errors to a data source from any application.    LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com
